mapper.select:
SELECT T.* FROM sys_operator_online T
ORDER BY T.id DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_operator_online( id, operator_id, username, host, system_host, user_agent, status, start_timestamp, last_access_time, timeout, session )VALUES( #{id}, #{operatorId}, #{username}, #{host}, #{systemHost}, #{userAgent}, #{status}, #{startTimestamp}, #{lastAccessTime}, #{timeout}, #{session,javaType=java.lang.Object,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_operator_online SET operator_id=#{operatorId}, username=#{username}, host=#{host}, system_host=#{systemHost}, user_agent=#{userAgent}, status=#{status}, start_timestamp=#{startTimestamp}, last_access_time=#{lastAccessTime}, timeout=#{timeout}, session=#{session,javaType=java.lang.Object,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from sys_operator_online o where o.last_access_time < #{expiredDate} order by o.last_access_time asc
